Title: Deadalive (2)
Plot: Shortly after Mulder is buried, Billy Miles is found very dead, but he somehow comes back to life. Skinner and Scully put all their hopes into digging up Mulder and discovering that he too, is still alive. As Mulder lies in the hospital without indication that he is going to fully recover, Krycek comes to Skinner and offers him a vaccine to the virus that has infected Mulder, but the cost of the vaccine is that Skinner has to kill Scully's unborn child.
GuestStars: Judson Scott, Gibby Brand, Larry Dorf, Nelson Mashita, David Doty, Mary Wickliffe, Larry Rippenkroeger, Richard McGonagle
